name: Homework-4 Union Carbide Gas Leak
description:
1. Here is the grading rubric for this assignment.
  2. There are two sets questions on this homework. You are asked to select one question from each set and answer a question to earn full credit. Please indicate in your answer which of the questions you have chosen to answer.
  3. Each answer should be no less than 250 words. I am looking for a detailed argumentation WITH references in text.
  4. Your quiz opens at noon, September 14, 2018 and closes on Monday, Sept 17, 2018 at 8:30am. You can open close the quiz as many times as you need to. NOTE THAT IF YOU HIT THE SUBMIT BUTTON, THE QUIZ IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE TO YOU TO COMPLETE OR EDIT. So, if you are not ready to submit the quiz, then leave the Canvas page but do not hit the submit button. The system saves your answers periodically. Make sure you leave the page after it saves your answer.
  5. You are required to write your answers in your own words and where ever applicable, you are also required to cite appropriately if you have quoted or used either your readings or any other external source. Citations will not be included the word count. Please use IEEE citation style. Note that absence of citation will entail reduction in points.
